name: Creating Global Resistance Movements
description: Establishing a decentralized, coordinated resistance against IDC control through strategic alliances and movement-building.

cards.title: Building Decentralized Resistance Cells
cards.description: Creating independent, adaptable resistance groups that operate outside IDC control mechanisms.
bulletpoints: Utilizing decentralized organization models to avoid infiltration.
Maintaining anonymity and operational security in resistance activities.
Leveraging encrypted communication and covert networking strategies.

cards.title: Strategic Alliances and Counter-Propaganda
cards.description: Forming alliances across ideological lines to counter IDC influence and misinformation.
bulletpoints: Identifying key allies in media, finance, and independent governance.
Developing counter-propaganda campaigns to expose IDC narratives.
Using psychological warfare tactics against elite-controlled institutions.

cards.title: Mass Awakening and Civil Disobedience
cards.description: Encouraging large-scale resistance and direct action movements against IDC policies and control structures.
bulletpoints: Leveraging civil disobedience to challenge IDC-enforced laws.
Creating grassroots awareness campaigns to undermine elite narratives.
Mobilizing global boycotts and financial withdrawal strategies.
